data.name: Decoding Replays detail
data.value: To utilize the app's features, you need to decode StarCraft 2 replays, extracting raw data from SC2Replay files. Initiate decoding by selecting the "New Replays" button on the top row or the "Decode" button on the "Home" screen.

data.name: Decoding Process detail
data.value: The initial decoding may take some time, typically 30-60 minutes per 1,000 replays. The duration depends on the number of replays and your hardware capabilities.

data.name: Optimizing Decoding detail
data.value: You can enhance decoding speed by configuring the number of CPU cores in the "Settings" screen. Note that during initial decoding, these cores will be heavily utilized.

data.name: Decoding Speed detail
data.value: Post the initial decoding, individual replays can be processed swiftly, ranging from 3-10 seconds based on the game duration.

data.name: Automatic Replay Detection detail
data.value: The app automatically identifies and decodes new replays in folders specified in the "Settings" screen if the application is open.

data.name: Pause and Resume Functionality detail
data.value: Decoding can be paused at any time, and the app will resume from the last position upon restarting.

data.name: Consent for Upload detail
data.value: To upload replays to the website, you must grant consent in the 'Settings' page. Once consented, decoded replays will be automatically uploaded, or you can manually press the 'Upload' button on the 'Home' screen.

data.name: Comparing Stats detail
data.value: Explore player and commander stats locally or, with consent, compare them online with other players for a comprehensive gaming analysis.

data.name: Community Support detail
data.value: Join our online community for additional assistance, updates, and discussions related to the app.
